head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths ZUCKERMAN, ROTHSTEIN, SAN DY

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths ZUCKERMAN, ROTHSTEIN, SAN DY

block.p: ZUCKERMAN - ROTHSTEIN - San dy. American Cancer Society volunteer, breast cancer advocate and friend. Our leader, crusader, and friend to all, you have been a guiding light and heart and soul of the Babe Zaharias Memorial Events of The American Cancer Society. We will miss you so much. Love-Your Friends From ''The Babe''
